[REDACTED] this is the case, you can mention this under the question "data usage license". A CC-BY license is only for open available data. Please also note the difference between KU [REDACTED] RDR (data repository where you can publish/deposit research data) and [REDACTED] (KU [REDACTED] repository for academic publications like articles, book chapters, etc.). [REDACTED] is however definitely a link between the two: when you publish research data in RDR, it will automatically appear in your [REDACTED] publication list.
